public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject add​(@RequestBody

      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="maxview/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.mam.MaxviewConfigVo vo)
        分页查询
        参数:
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        startTime - 可选
        endTime - 可选
        name - 可选，终端名称，支持模糊查询
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":1,"list":[{"id":1,"name":"终端1","ip":"192.168.6.14","port":"80","username":"admin","password":"14e24dc8cf60446f56eb163a7b85bce8a53d3f766badf15e86a1af857d9a9012","crtTime":1542211200000}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":5,"size":1,"startRow":1,"endRow":1,"pages":1,"prePage":0,"nextPage":0,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":true,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":false,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":1,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":1}}
